name: 0x404
description: $0X404 Token The $0x404 token is a cornerstone of the 0x404 ecosystem, offering holders a 60% share in the platform's revenue. This revenue is sourced from deployment fees, feature-based charges, and ad revenues. Token holders receive periodic, proportional distributions, directly linking their investment to the platform's success and fostering a committed community. 0x404 is a comprehensive suite of tools/toolkit and enhancements designed to advance the ERC404 token standard, offering unprecedented flexibility and utility for token creators and users alike. By integrating liquidity and fractionalization features from ERC20 and ERC721 tokens, 0x404 aims to revolutionize tokenization across various domains. Revenue Sharing with $0x404 Token Holders A significant portion of the revenue, 60%, is dedicated to being shared with the holders of the $0x404 token. This approach aligns the interests of the platform with those of its users and token holders, creating a mutually beneficial ecosystem.
